files.description: Implements the minimal artifact creation success gate by creating the /outputs structure (README and versioned CHANGELOG) and verifying required files exist and are non-empty before cycle completion.
Marks the src directory as a package to support imports for the artifact gate module and CLI entrypoint.
Provides a runnable CLI script that invokes artifact creation and the automated existence/non-empty checks with clear exit codes for CI or manual runs.
End-to-end tests that validate folder/file creation, non-empty content enforcement, changelog versioning behavior, and failure modes when artifacts are missing or empty.
Documents the purpose of the outputs directory, its required folder structure, and the checklist/automation expectations for artifact completion.
Maintains a versioned changelog for artifacts produced across cycles with a minimal consistent format suitable for automated appends.
Ensures the outputs directory is present in version control even when generated artifacts are not yet committed.
Ensures the primary artifacts subdirectory exists to receive cycle deliverables and to satisfy the required folder structure gate.
Ensures the logs subdirectory exists for run metadata and gate reports as part of the required outputs folder structure.
Ensures the reviews subdirectory exists for consistency reviews and related documents as part of the required outputs folder structure.
Project-level documentation explaining how the artifact creation success gate works, how to run it, and how to interpret failures.
Defines minimal project configuration including test runner settings and an optional console script entrypoint for the artifact gate CLI.

missionDescription: Implement a minimal “artifact creation success” gate: create /outputs with README + folder structure + versioned CHANGELOG, then add an automated check (or manual checklist) that confirms files exist and are non-empty before ending a cycle.
missionSuccessCriteria: Complete the urgent task identified by Meta-Coordinator

Curated insight (actionability 8-9/10): Directly targets the current blocking failure mode (no artifacts created), enabling reliable creation of the /outputs scaffold and any subsequent meta-analysis/tooling deliverables....
projectName: /outputs with README + folder structure + versioned CHANGELOG, then add an automated check (or manual checklist) that confirms files exist and are non-empty before ending a cycle.
